column4: Does somebody know how to make an image of a Linux system installation? (like Acronis Image does with Windows)
TJ13820, well if you want an exact image of a disk or partition.  sudo dd if=/dev/sda of=/path/to/image
TJ13820 though i would suggest using something like tar to backup data on a partition.  dd copies freespace too, which is sometimes undesirable.  tar czf /path/to/backup.tar.gz /path/to/backup
